New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 2 月 12 日星期一 00:49:35 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Trains cancelled across Auckland due to ‘heat’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/trains-cancelled-across-auckland-due-to-heat/FTQVJQEM5ZD4ZNTYHMUCGUNWOA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/trains-cancelled-across-auckland-due-to-heat/FTQVJQEM5ZD4ZNTYHMUCGUNWOA/ Trains on all lines will be affected from 1pm to 8pm. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 00:47:17 +0000 Trains have been cancelled across the Auckland network due to the "heat".
Wanganui Surf Lifeguard Service presented $16,000 from Running of the Balls event https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/wanganui-surf-lifeguard-service-presented-16000-from-running-of-the-balls-event/ALBQM5GHD5AH5MLY2SL3KJETVI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/wanganui-surf-lifeguard-service-presented-16000-from-running-of-the-balls-event/ALBQM5GHD5AH5MLY2SL3KJETVI/ Steve CarleWanganui Surf Lifeguard Service Inc received $16,000 from event Mon, 12 Feb 2024 00:32:45 +0000 Shaun Libeau, chairman of Wanganui Lifeguard Service Inc, and Bex Sharratt, communications officer, Juan Coffey (JJ Roofing), Sophie Smith (lifeguard), Janelle Coffey (JJ Roofing), Greta Cox (lifeguard) and Lucy Reid (lifeguard).

Dunedin Countdown rats: Pest controllers catch 13 rats over the weekend https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dunedin-countdown-stays-close-another-day-as-rat-inspection-continues-four-rats-found/J7VVU32GZJG3XI6H5K5KEKW3RA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dunedin-countdown-stays-close-another-day-as-rat-inspection-continues-four-rats-found/J7VVU32GZJG3XI6H5K5KEKW3RA/ Hamish MacLeanAn employee has said the initial response to the rat infestation was slow. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 00:23:22 +0000 Woolworths New Zealand confirmed this photo of a rat, reflected in a mirror in the deli section, was taken at its Dunedin South Countdown supermarket.

Rotorua cancer survivor rallies painters, suppliers to paint Cancer Society office for free https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/rotorua-cancer-survivor-rallies-painters-suppliers-to-paint-cancer-society-office-for-free/ZHAJ2XVE2FH2RFYPY26I3E4WYM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/rotorua-cancer-survivor-rallies-painters-suppliers-to-paint-cancer-society-office-for-free/ZHAJ2XVE2FH2RFYPY26I3E4WYM/ Megan WilsonThe painter says working outside may have caused his melanoma diagnosis. Photo / Andrew Warner

Photo / Alex Cairns
Highly mutated JN.1 variant behind 93 per cent of recent Covid-19 infections in NZ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/highly-mutated-jn1-variant-behind-93-per-cent-of-recent-covid-19-infections-in-nz/BBFUTJOHZFEDZFTL6OKPHI7MGY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/highly-mutated-jn1-variant-behind-93-per-cent-of-recent-covid-19-infections-in-nz/BBFUTJOHZFEDZFTL6OKPHI7MGY/ Jamie MortonJN.1 variant responsible for nine in 10 infections picked up in wastewater sampling. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 23:08:35 +0000 ESR’s latest surveillance showed the JN.1 variant accounted for 93 per cent of coronavirus detected through wastewater sampling, along with three-quarters of sequenced samples from hospitals.
